resources.string: El contingut del toot s\'ha copiat al porta-retalls
La direcció web del toot ha sigut copiat al porta-retalls
El vostre aparell sembla que no permet la introducció de veu!
Mides del text i la icona
Canvia la mida del text actual:
Canvia la mida de la icona actual:
Noves dades estan disponibles! Voleu visualitzar-les?
Si us plau, espereu uns segons abans de fer aquesta acció.
Voleu suprimir el compte %1$s de l\'aplicació?
Feu clic en a la ruta per canviar-la
La següent informació pot reflectir el perfil de l\'usuari incomplet.
L\'app no ha recollit emojis personalitzats de moment.
El toot s\'ha afegit als preferits
El toot s\'ha suprimit dels preferits!
Afegir aquesta toot als seus favorits?
Esborrar aquest toot dels teus favorits?

resources.string: Fes clic al botó per mostrar el toot original

No hi ha cap petició de seguiment
No hi ha toots programats per mostrar!
Escriu un tot i seleccionar Temporització al menú de dalt.
S\'ha guardat la temporització d\'un toot!
La data programada ha de ser posterior al moment actual!
L\'estalvi de bateria està activat! Això pot no rutllar com està previst.
El silenciament ha de durar més d\'un minut.
%1$s ha estat silenciat fins a %2$s.\n vostè pot inatenuar aquest compte des de la seva pàgina de perfil.
%1$s està silenciat fins a %2$s.\n Feu clic aquí per desactivar el silenciament.

S\'ha eliminat el toot dels teus preferits!

First letter in capital for replies
Please, confirm push notifications that you want to receive. You can enable or disable these notifications later in settings (Notifications tab).
For unread toots in home time-line?
There are %1$s of data in cache.\n\nWould you like to delete them?
No toots were found in database. Please, use the synchronize button from the menu to retrieve them.

Only basic information from accounts are stored on the device. These data are strictly confidential and can only be used by the application. Deleting the application immediately removes these data.\n ⚠ Login and passwords are never stored. They are only used during a secure authentication (SSL) with an instance.

- ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE: Used to detect if the device is connected to a WIFI network.
 - INTERNET: Used for queries to an instance.
 - WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: Used to store media or to move the app on a SD card.
 - READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: Used to add media to toots.
 - BOOT_COMPLETED: Used to start the notification service.
 - WAKE_LOCK: Used during the notification service.

- Read: Read data.
 - Write: Post statuses and upload media for statuses.
 - Follow: Follow, unfollow, block, unblock.

 ⚠ These actions are carried out only when user requests them.

The application does not use tracking tools (audience measurement, error reporting, etc.) and does not contain any advertising.

 The use of libraries is minimized: 
 - Glide: To manage media
 - Android-Job: To manage services
 - PhotoView: To manage images

The application offers the ability to translate toots using the locale of the device and the Yandex API.\n Yandex has its proper privacy-policy which can be found here: https://yandex.ru/legal/confidential/?lang=en
Thank you to Stéphane for the logo.
Are you sure you want to permanently delete this list?
There is nothing in this list yet. When members of this list post new statuses, they will appear here.

Here are some checks that might help:

 - Check there is no spelling mistakes in the instance name

 - Check that your instance is not down

 - If you use the two-factor authentication (2FA), please use the link at the bottom (once the instance name is filled)

 - You can also use this link without using the 2FA

 - If it still does not work, please raise an issue on GitLab at https://gitlab.com/tom79/mastalab/issues
Media has been loaded. Click here to display it.
This action can be quite long. You will be notified when it will be finished.

Open the menu of a toot and then choose Schedule boost.

In this field, you need to write your instance host name.
For example, if you created your account on https://mastodon.social
Just write mastodon.social (without https://)
 You can start writing first letters and names will be suggested.

 ⚠ The Login button will only work if the instance name is valid and the instance is up!
In this field, write the email that is attached to your Mastodon account.
Last step is to enter your password and click on Login.
